alert.note: Alert for Blount Smoky Mountains; Cocke Smoky Mountains; Sevier Smoky Mountains (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued March 31 at 2:18AM CDT until March 31 at 5:00AM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...Red Flag Warning for Smoky Mountain counties until 6 AM EDT... .The combination of high winds, low relative humidity, and dry fuels will create hazardous conditions for fires to spread this this morning. ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM EDT EARLY THIS MORNING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW HUMIDITY FOR THE SMOKY MOUNTAINS... * TIMING...Until 6 AM EDT. * WIND...Sustained winds 50 mph with gusts up to 70 to 80 mph in the mountains and foothills. Winds decreasing early this morning. * HUMIDITY...40 percent. * IMPACTS...any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now....or are expected to occur shortly. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Blount Smoky Mountains; Cocke Smoky Mountains; Sevier Smoky Mountains
